thread.title: Fund Reaps Windfall Investing in ETF ‘Minefield’
thread.title_full: Fund Reaps Windfall Investing in ETF ‘Minefield’ - WSJ

author: Daisy Maxey
title: Fund Reaps Windfall Investing in ETF ‘Minefield’
text:
A small mutual fund has returned 42% so far this year with an investment strategy involving exchange-traded funds that have been criticized in past years as a “minefield” for individual investors.
David Miller, senior portfolio manager of the $141 million Catalyst Macro Strategy Fund, isn’t saying that these particular ETFs—which make leveraged bets on various indexes going up or down—are a great investment for individuals. Indeed,... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
